CustomField.description: Approval tier based on confidence, customer value, and risk
CustomField.label: Approval Tier

value.label: Auto-Send
value.description: High confidence, standard event - sends automatically with notification

value.label: Soft Review
value.description: Medium confidence - auto-sends in 4 hours unless marketer intervenes

value.label: Review Required
value.description: Low confidence or high-value customer - marketer must approve

value.label: Escalate
value.description: Very high value or sensitive content - requires manager approval
